name: 林榮禾
objective:
介紹概念和解決問題的技術在生產管理和運營管理中的重要性。主題包括需求預測、容量管理、資源配置、庫存管理、供應鏈管理、品質控制和專案管理。
Introduction to concepts and problem-solving techniques important in production management and operations management. Topics include demand forecasting, capacity management, resource allocation, inventory management, supply chain management, quality control, and project management.
schedule:
Topics Covered
Section	Topic
16.1	Importance of Scheduling
16.2	High-Volume vs. Low-Volume Scheduling
16.3	Gantt Charts
16.4	Job-Shop Rules (FCFS, SPT, EDD, CR)
16.5	Scheduling Performance Metrics
16.6	Flow-Shop Scheduling
16.7	Theory of Constraints & Bottleneck Management
16.8	Service Operations Scheduling
scorePolicy:
Quiz - Short problems on priority rules and metrics	20%
Homework - Scheduling problems and Gantt chart creation	30%
Group Project - Apply scheduling concepts to a case scenario	40%
Class Participation - Group discussion and idea sharing	10%
materials: 1. William J. Stevenson, Operations Management, 14th Edition - Chapter 16: Scheduling, 2021
